author: Jason_LEGO
title: My introduction into LEGO
review: This was my first LEGO set. I was only 4 or 5 years old, but I still remember the excitement of receiving this from my grandparents. Not too much to review here, it is what it is. A very basic introductory LEGO set. It did come with 1 mini figure, but there wasn't a lot of interaction between it and the LEGO bricks. The mini fig could not sit in the car, nor could it occupy the house if built as per the instructions. However, it was an excellent introduction into LEGO for me and I am still hooked to this day. After receiving this set, LEGO instantly became my favorite toy. The basic bright colors and countless options for building spawned decades of creativity for me. Thanks LEGO.
